mapper.select: SELECT count(post_id) FROM( select post_id from `comment` join `post` on post_id = comment_post_num where comment_user_id = #{cri.search} group by post_id) a
select `post`.* from `comment` join `post` on post_id = comment_post_num where comment_user_id = #{cri.search} group by post_id ORDER BY post_id DESC LIMIT #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.perPageNum}
select count(*) from upvote where user_id = #{cri.search} and upvote = 1
select a.* from post as a join upvote as b on a.post_id = b.post_id where user_id = #{cri.search} and upvote = 1
